original: Mosourika Tudor was delivering food to Justin Waye during the time of the accident. Justin apparently never had time to make food for himself. So, she delivered his dinner to him everyday.\n\nMosourika didn’t find Justin in the freight area that day. So, she went looking for him and spotted him in the refinery building before he fell.
translation:
事故发生时，莫苏里卡·都铎正给贾斯汀·维耶送餐。贾斯汀从来没空自备餐食，每天都吃莫苏里卡送来的晚餐。



莫苏里卡那天在货物区没有找到贾斯汀。贾斯汀坠落身亡之前，莫苏里卡在精炼厂看见了他。
